verses.verse: In those <WH1992> days <WH3117> there was no <WH369> king <WH4428> in Israel: <WH3478> and in those <WH1992> days <WH3117> the tribe <WH7626> of the Danites <WH1839> sought <WH1245> them an inheritance <WH5159> to dwell <WH3427> in; for <WH3588> unto <WH5704> that <WH1931> day <WH3117> all their inheritance <WH5159> had not <WH3808> fallen <WH5307> unto them among <WH8432> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> sent <WH7971> of their family <WH4480> <WH4940> five <WH2568> men <WH376> from their coasts, <WH4480> <WH7098> men <WH376> of valor, <WH2428> from Zorah, <WH4480> <WH6881> and from Eshtaol, <WH4480> <WH847> to spy out <WH7270> <WH853> the land, <WH776> and to search <WH2713> it; and they said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Go, <WH1980> search <WH2713> <WH853> the land: <WH776> who when they came <WH935> to mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> to <WH5704> the house <WH1004> of Micah, <WH4318> they lodged <WH3885> there. <WH8033>

When they <WH1992> were by <WH5973> the house <WH1004> of Micah, <WH4318> they <WH1992> knew <WH5234> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of the young man <WH5288> the Levite: <WH3881> and they turned in <WH5493> thither, <WH8033> and said <WH559> unto him, Who <WH4310> brought <WH935> thee hither? <WH1988> and what <WH4100> makest <WH6213> thou <WH859> in this <WH2088> place? and what <WH4100> hast thou here? <WH6311>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH2090> and thus <WH2090> dealeth <WH6213> Micah <WH4318> with me, and hath hired <WH7936> me, and I am <WH1961> his priest. <WH3548>

And they said <WH559> unto him, Ask counsel, <WH7592> we pray thee, <WH4994> of God, <WH430> that we may know <WH3045> whether our way <WH1870> which <WH834> we <WH587> go <WH1980> shall be prosperous. <WH6743>
And the priest <WH3548> said <WH559> unto them, Go <WH1980> in peace: <WH7965> before <WH5227> the LORD <WH3068> is your way <WH1870> wherein <WH834> ye go. <WH1980>

Then the five <WH2568> men <WH376> departed, <WH1980> and came <WH935> to Laish, <WH3919> and saw <WH7200> <WH853> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were therein, <WH7130> how they dwelt <WH3427> careless, <WH983> after the manner <WH4941> of the Zidonians, <WH6722> quiet <WH8252> and secure; <WH982> and there was no <WH369> magistrate <WH3423> <WH6114> in the land, <WH776> that might put them to shame <WH3637> in any thing; <WH1697> and they <WH1992> were far <WH7350> from the Zidonians, <WH4480> <WH6722> and had no <WH369> business <WH1697> with <WH5973> any man. <WH120>
And they came <WH935> unto <WH413> their brethren <WH251> to Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol: <WH847> and their brethren <WH251> said <WH559> unto them, What <WH4100> say ye? <WH859>

And they said, <WH559> Arise, <WH6965> that we may go up <WH5927> against <WH5921> them: for <WH3588> we have seen <WH7200> <WH853> the land, <WH776> and, behold, <WH2009> it is very <WH3966> good: <WH2896> and are ye <WH859> still? <WH2814> be not slothful <WH6101> <WH408> to go, <WH1980> and to enter <WH935> to possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land. <WH776>

When ye go, <WH935> ye shall come <WH935> unto <WH413> a people <WH5971> secure, <WH982> and to a large <WH7342> land: <WH776> for <WH3588> God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> it into your hands; <WH3027> a place <WH4725> where <WH834> there is no <WH369> want <WH4270> of any <WH3605> thing <WH1697> that <WH834> is in the earth. <WH776>

And there went <WH5265> from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> of the family <WH4480> <WH4940> of the Danites, <WH1839> out of Zorah <WH4480> <WH6881> and out of Eshtaol, <WH4480> <WH847> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> appointed <WH2296> with weapons <WH3627> of war. <WH4421>

And they went up, <WH5927> and pitched <WH2583> in Kirjath-jearim, <WH7157> in Judah: <WH3063> wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called <WH7121> that <WH1931> place <WH4725> Mahaneh-dan <WH4265> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day: <WH3117> behold, <WH2009> it is behind <WH310> Kirjath-jearim. <WH7157>
And they passed <WH5674> thence <WH4480> <WH8033> unto mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> and came <WH935> unto <WH5704> the house <WH1004> of Micah. <WH4318>

Then answered <WH6030> the five <WH2568> men <WH376> that went <WH1980> to spy out <WH7270> <WH853> the country <WH776> of Laish, <WH3919> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> their brethren, <WH251> Do ye know <WH3045> that <WH3588> there is <WH3426> in these <WH428> houses <WH1004> an ephod, <WH646> and teraphim, <WH8655> and a graven image, <WH6459> and a molten image? <WH4541> now <WH6258> therefore consider <WH3045> what <WH4100> ye have to do. <WH6213>

And they turned <WH5493> thitherward, <WH8033> and came <WH935> to <WH413> the house <WH1004> of the young man <WH5288> the Levite, <WH3881> even unto the house <WH1004> of Micah, <WH4318> and saluted <WH7592> <WH7965> him.

And the six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> appointed <WH2296> with their weapons <WH3627> of war, <WH4421> which <WH834> were of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Dan, <WH1835> stood <WH5324> by the entering <WH6607> of the gate. <WH8179>

And the five <WH2568> men <WH376> that went <WH5927> to spy out <WH7270> <WH853> the land <WH776> went up, <WH5927> and came in <WH935> thither, <WH8033> and took <WH3947> <WH853> the graven image, <WH6459> and the ephod, <WH646> and the teraphim, <WH8655> and the molten image: <WH4541> and the priest <WH3548> stood <WH5324> in the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> with the six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> that were appointed <WH2296> with weapons <WH3627> of war. <WH4421>

And these <WH428> went <WH935> into Micah's <WH4318> house, <WH1004> and fetched <WH3947> <WH853> the carved image, <WH6459> the ephod, <WH646> and the teraphim, <WH8655> and the molten image. <WH4541> Then said <WH559> the priest <WH3548> unto <WH413> them, What <WH4100> do <WH6213> ye? <WH859>

And they said <WH559> unto him, Hold thy peace, <WH2790> lay <WH7760> thine hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> thy mouth, <WH6310> and go <WH1980> with <WH5973> us, and be <WH1961> to us a father <WH1> and a priest: <WH3548> is it better <WH2896> for thee to be <WH1961> a priest <WH3548> unto the house <WH1004> of one <WH259> man, <WH376> or <WH176> that thou be <WH1961> a priest <WH3548> unto a tribe <WH7626> and a family <WH4940> in Israel? <WH3478>

And the priest's <WH3548> heart <WH3820> was glad, <WH3190> and he took <WH3947> <WH853> the ephod, <WH646> and the teraphim, <WH8655> and the graven image, <WH6459> and went <WH935> in the midst <WH7130> of the people. <WH5971>
So they turned <WH6437> and departed, <WH1980> and put <WH7760> <WH853> the little ones <WH2945> and the cattle <WH4735> and the carriage <WH3520> before <WH6440> them.

And when they <WH1992> were a good way <WH7368> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of Micah, <WH4318> the men <WH376> that <WH834> were in the houses <WH1004> near <WH5973> to Micah's <WH4318> house <WH1004> were gathered together, <WH2199> and overtook <WH1692> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Dan. <WH1835>

And they cried <WH7121> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Dan. <WH1835> And they turned <WH5437> their faces, <WH6440> and said <WH559> unto Micah, <WH4318> What <WH4100> aileth thee, that <WH3588> thou comest with such a company? <WH2199>

And he said, <WH559> Ye have taken away <WH3947> <WH853> my gods <WH430> which <WH834> I made, <WH6213> and the priest, <WH3548> and ye are gone away: <WH1980> and what <WH4100> have I more? <WH5750> and what <WH4100> is this <WH2088> that ye say <WH559> unto <WH413> me, What <WH4100> aileth thee?

And the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Let not <WH408> thy voice <WH6963> be heard <WH8085> among <WH5973> us, lest <WH6435> angry <WH4751> <WH5315> fellows <WH376> run <WH6293> upon thee, and thou lose <WH622> thy life, <WH5315> with the lives <WH5315> of thy household. <WH1004>

And the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went <WH1980> their way: <WH1870> and when Micah <WH4318> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> they <WH1992> were too strong <WH2389> for <WH4480> him, he turned <WH6437> and went back <WH7725> unto <WH413> his house. <WH1004>

And they <WH1992> took <WH3947> <WH853> the things which <WH834> Micah <WH4318> had made, <WH6213> and the priest <WH3548> which <WH834> he had, <WH1961> and came <WH935> unto <WH5921> Laish, <WH3919> unto <WH5921> a people <WH5971> that were at quiet <WH8252> and secure: <WH982> and they smote <WH5221> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and burnt <WH8313> the city <WH5892> with fire. <WH784>

And there was no <WH369> deliverer, <WH5337> because <WH3588> it <WH1931> was far <WH7350> from Zidon, <WH4480> <WH6721> and they had no <WH369> business <WH1697> with <WH5973> any man; <WH120> and it <WH1931> was in the valley <WH6010> that <WH834> lieth by Beth-rehob. <WH1050> And they built <WH1129> <WH853> a city, <WH5892> and dwelt <WH3427> therein.

And they called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> Dan, <WH1835> after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father, <WH1> who <WH834> was born <WH3205> unto Israel: <WH3478> howbeit <WH199> the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was Laish <WH3919> at the first. <WH7223>

And the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> set up <WH6965> <WH853> the graven image: <WH6459> and Jonathan, <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Gershom, <WH1648> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> he <WH1931> and his sons <WH1121> were <WH1961> priests <WH3548> to the tribe <WH7626> of Dan <WH1839> until <WH5704> the day <WH3117> of the captivity <WH1540> of the land. <WH776>

And they set them up <WH7760> <WH853> Micah's <WH4318> graven image, <WH6459> which <WH834> he made, <WH6213> all <WH3605> the time <WH3117> that the house <WH1004> of God <WH430> was <WH1961> in Shiloh. <WH7887>
